Nazywam się Radosław Jakubowski. Pochodz: My name is Radosław Jakubowski. I come from Podkarpackie Voivodeship region in Poland, more precisely from small village near Jasło town. There I have taken my first steps and written my first letters. I will never forget the day, when computer appeared in my house. Since that I spent long hours in front of it, but my unaware parents were repeating all the time 'What's the purpose...?' My story had some turns and today I live programming.
Jak do tego doszło? Podczas pandemii str: How did it happen? During worldwide pandemic I've lost job connected to my original profession and decided to awake the inner child, which had spent days in front of computer having fun. Stubborness, determination and hard work let me devour the basics really quick... So quick, that after few months of learning I got my internship in software development, where I took my first steps. Learning still goes on - and what matters most - it's great pleasure and joy.
